attributes.action: Facilitate the public with a direct vote on our confidence in this government.
attributes.additional_details: Dissatisfaction over (I) the non-representative FPTP system is growing; less than 50% of the popular vote has provided the government with a huge majority, (ii) the current government's handling of the Corona virus and of brexit negotiations is also growing. The people must be provided with a means to overthrow any government that they feel do not act in their best interests, should the electorate indicate online or by post such a desire. The full list should be visible online, open to scrutiny.
attributes.background: We, the people, demand a means to provide a direct vote of no confidence on this and all future governments. Should 51% of the public indicate a discontent for the government, the opposition will be allowed to form a minority government. This can be achieved online or by post for any UK citizen.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example you could start a new petition asking for General Elections to be held more frequently. 

You may wish to sign this petition about referendums on confidence in the Government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548897
